title: Filipino Fear
description:
We just launched a new animated short on Youtube.com/Snarled that takes place in the Philippines! So for today's episode, Sapphire will be sharing her favorite past stories that also feature Filipino families. First, she'll tell her friend Lauren's experience living in a haunted house, followed by her grandpa's close encounter with a popular mythical creature. Then, relive her mother's most unexplainable night, and witness the exorcism of a family friend. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit podcastchoices.com/adchoices
